explanation: The report is correct. In get_request_line_inner the code zero-terminates the method token (c->read_buffer[p] = 0) and then calls parse_http_std_method(c, c->rq.method, p). Thus the pointer passed to parse_http_std_method (m) points at a null-terminated string. parse_http_std_method then uses memcmp(m, MHD_HTTP_METHOD_..., len) to compare that buffer with string literals (which are also null-terminated). MISRA C 2023 Rule 21.14 forbids using memcmp to compare null-terminated strings; therefore this use constitutes a violation.
